General.Name: AirAsia X Bhd
General.Description: AirAsia X Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, provides long haul air transportation services under the AirAsia brand in Malaysia, Thailand, and Indonesia. The company also offers logistical management and marketing services; and provision of leases aircraft facilities. The company was formerly known as Fly Asian Xpress Sdn Bhd and changed its name to AirAsia X Berhad in September 2007. AirAsia X Berhad was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
